title._content: Seth Low -- Mrs. C.S. Whitman -- Lorillard Spencer  (LOC)

description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Seth Low -- Mrs. C.S. Whitman -- Lorillard Spencer [1915 Jan. 1] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Photograph shows educator and politician Seth Low (1850-1916) with Mrs. Charles Seymour Whitman (Olive Hitchcock) (1880-1928), her daughter, Olive; and Lorillard Spencer (1883-1939), military Secretary to Governor Charles Seymour Whitman, at Governor Whitman's inauguration, Albany, New York, January 1, 1915. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2012) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.18085 Call Number: LC-B2- 3337-14
